articles.description: The risk of exposure to the coronavirus on flights is very low, a U.S. Department of Defense study released on Thursday found, a positive sign for the airline industry as it tries to rebound from the pandemic's crushing effect on travel.
articles.content:
By Reuters Staff
(Reuters) - The risk of exposure to the coronavirus on flights is very low, a U.S. Department of Defense study released on Thursday found, a positive sign for the airline industry a… [+1957 chars]

articles.author: insider@insider.com (Neil Dutta)
articles.title: Let's set some things straight about the 'K-shaped' economic recovery freak out
articles.description: The US economy is making a "K-shaped" recovery from the coronavirus. But it makes sense when you look at industry closures and decades of inequality.
articles.content: Peruse economic and financial market pundits on Twitter and you'll quickly find the following: anyone that believes the US recovery from the pandemic-driven collapse to be "V-shaped" – that is, quite… [+5464 chars]
